Text: Strategic Recruitment SurveyFor the First Half of EWS Recruiting Services has filled open positions in our client businesses and we dont plan on easing our efforts a bit Our goal is to continue to improve our service to maximize alignment with the needs of our businesses We want to ensure that we move at the speed of Enron Please take a few moments to complete this brief question survey to let us know how were doing It should take no more than minutes to complete All responses will be kept confidential Your opinions matter to us so please take the time to reply today Regards Neil Davies Director of Recruiting Click on the link below to access the survey Experiencing technical problems If the link does not automatically launch the questionnaire Launch by copying the URL address into your browser or If you continue to have technical difficulties please contact Todd Peikert at or x Please do not forward this link to anyone else wipiasprsAMXNIBJNl

Strategic Recruitment Survey ReminderNonPrivilegedpst This is a reminder to please complete our brief survey only questions regarding the services provided by our Enron Recruiting group It should take no more than minutes to complete All responses will be kept confidential The few minutes necessary to provide feedback will be invaluable in guiding future enhancements and offerings from our group This survey closes at pm Wednesday September so reply today Click on the link below to access the survey Experiencing technical problems If the link does not automatically launch the questionnaire Launch by copying the URL address into your browser or If you continue to have technical difficulties please contact Todd Peikert at or x wipiasprsLUIKQLDOl
